name: Create a MailChimp contact from a LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms submission
description:
Every time a new LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms lead is submitted, a new contact will be created in MailChimp.

The template assumes your LinkedIn form collects these details:
1) First name
2) Last name
3) Email

The template also expects your MailChimp list to have these fields aside from the email address field:
1) First name
2) Last name
